Segment.name: VID
Segment.comment: To identify a conveyance and its attributes

Field.name: EquipmentDescriptionCode
Field.comment: Code identifying type of equipment used for shipment

Field.name: EquipmentInitial
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: SealNumber1
Field.comment: Unique number on seal used to close a shipment

Field.name: SealNumber2
Field.comment: Unique number on seal used to close a shipment

Field.name: EquipmentLength
Field.comment: Length (in feet and inches) of equipment ordered or used to transport shipment (The format is FFFII where FFF is feet and II is inches; the range for II is 00 through 11)

Field.name: Height
Field.comment: Vertical dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

Field.name: Width
Field.comment: Shorter measurement of the two horizontal dimensions measured with the object in the upright position

Field.name: LoadEmptyStatusCode
Field.comment: Code which specifies the loaded condition of transportation equipment

Field.name: TypeOfServiceCode
Field.comment: Code specifying extent of transportation service requested

Field.name: LocationIdentifier
Field.comment: Code which identifies a specific location
